sentences.sContent: Losses would then be a licit investment in future profits.
sentences.sContent_eng: Losses would then be a licit investment in future profits.
sentences.sCn: 这样一来，损失就可视作为博取将来利润而进行的合法投资。

sentences.sContent: In 1215, the church decreed that a "licit" marriage must take place in church.
sentences.sContent_eng: In 1215, the church decreed that a "licit" marriage must take place in church.
sentences.sCn: 1215年，教会规定，结婚双方必须在教堂结婚才可视为“合法”婚姻。
